Address.Address1: 291, Bd. Mohamed V et angle Azilal

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Imperial Casablanca, you'll be centrally located in Casablanca, convenient to Central Market of Casablanca and Hassan II Mosque. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Complex Cultural Sidi Belyout and United Nations Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 105 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This Art Deco hotel also features a fireplace in the lobby, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Imperial Casablanca, you'll be centrally located in Casablanca, convenient to Central Market of Casablanca and Hassan II Mosque. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Complex Cultural Sidi Belyout and United Nations Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Central Market of Casablanca - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Complex Cultural Sidi Belyout - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
United Nations Square - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Place Mohammed V - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Chleuh Mosque - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Parc de la Ligue Arabe - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Cathedrale Sacre Coeur - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Port of Casablanca - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Marina Casablanca - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Casablanca Twin Center - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Hassan II Mosque - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Stade Mohammed V - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Casablanca Technopark - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Hassan II University - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Morocco Mall - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Imperial Casablanca is Casablanca (CMN-Mohammed V) - 25.1 km / 15.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
